meanings.sent1: The mastigophoran swims using its flagellum to move around.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of flagellates.

meanings.definition: A member of the phylum Mastigophora.
meanings.sent1: The mastigophoran is a key member of the Mastigophora phylum.
